item.title: How do you change the starting point?
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

[quote=“tj007razor, post:3, topic:153733”]I don’t know if your source has it, but try this
go into player.java and find // initial x and y coordinates of the player
you should see something like // initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet teleportToX = 3254; teleportToY = 3420;change the teleportToX = 3254; teleportToY = 3420; to whatever you want as the starting loc.[/quote]I beat you by about 5 mins bud

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change the starting point?

item.title: How do you change the starting point?
item.dc:creator: @tj007razor tj007razor
item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

I don’t know if your source has it, but try this
go into player.java and find // initial x and y coordinates of the player
you should see something like // initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet teleportToX = 3254; teleportToY = 3420;change the teleportToX = 3254; teleportToY = 3420; to whatever you want as the starting loc.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you change the starting point?
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

Player.java
Search // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet or search teleportToX and you should see x and y coords, just change them.

Read full topic
